text: mariyu miru mi sakti meraku balasamagrini, yud'dhapu gurralanu sid'dhaparacukoni, dani dvara allah ku satruvulaina mi satruvulanu mariyu allah ku telisi, miku teliyani itarulanu kuda bhayakampituluga ceyandi. Mariyu allah marganlo miru emi kharcu cesina dani phalitam miku purtiga cellinca badutundi. Mariyu mikelanti an'yayam jaragadu
